about_the_game:
It has Ship VS. Fortress battles

  • Realistic ship against fortress battles featuring walls that react and crumble into little pieces when struck by cannonballs

And Ship VS. Ship battles

  • Realistic ship against ship battles on the open seas and near shore with the need to account for waves, wind, and weather just like a real ship

  • Realistic cannon shot aiming and firing with physics based ballistics

  • Control the movement of the hero ship and movement of the cannon turret at the same time

Wow that's quite a cannon you've got there

  • Our crew's gadget-guy-extraordinaire "Sparks" (and our band's bass player) designed the turret super cannon named Comeuppance to be able to rotate 360 degrees, and to be able to aim up/down between minus 20 degrees and all the way to 90 degrees straight-up

  • Thankfully for us that special weapon and the design of our hero-ship give's us a huge advantage over conventional ships with only side-mounted cannons (especially with Short Fuse at the controls)

  • Extremely immersive gameplay with multiple views from inside and outside the cannon turret

Deploy "Special Agent Portside" your high-flying-super-spy

  • Get a bird's-eye-view of the full fighting action during the game when Portside takes to the skies under your full control

  • You are able to leave the ship at any time, then fly Portside in any direction (and hover) to scout out the enemy from above

  • Or just fly for fun to explore the entire game without any limitations

  • You can even deploy Portside's "secret weapon" IF you can figure it out

You're Listening to WRRRRRR Pirate Radio

Broadcasting live from the top of the Skyway Bridge in Tampa, Florida

It's the Forward Stern and Bobbin Show!

  • While playing you can tune in to WRRRRRR Pirate Radio where our in-game DJ's (Forward Stern and Bobbin) play the hits and do their best to make us laugh and keep us entertained between songs (while those of us with cannons fight)

CRAZY CAPTAIN CANNON ROCKS

Featuring the best ROCKING sea-shanties of all time performed by AMAZING musical artists including

  • Jonathan Young's hit song "Man the Cannons" PLUS his rocking version of "Wellerman"

  • The Longest John's hit song "Hoist Up The Thing"

  • Crazy Captain Cannon's hit song "Cheers To The Commoners", plus CCC's rocking versions of "Drunken Sailor" and the "1812 Overture"

  • Many epic original songs composed and produced by Alexander Nakarada

  • The entire soundtrack features well over 100 more songs

  • PLUS it includes DJ entertainment between songs

  • Many NEW songs and NEW DJ clips will be added to the game in the future for free

CHEERS TO THE COMMONERS

  • Meet Crazy Captain Cannon plus the rest of the crew (and band) named: Portside, Short Fuse, Forward Stern, Bobbin, and Sparks (who in addition to many other things) are starring in the-world's-greatest-cannon-based-video-game-of-all-time named

    Crazy Captain Cannon - Mission: Billionaire Buster

  • We are the commoners! We are vastly outnumbered and outgunned by enemy forces being funded by billionaires and behemoth corporations who are commanded by General "Doosh" Enis who leads an entire army of lesser-dooshes. As you know there are a lot of dooshes out there, so we have a lot of work to do (and we need your help).

Crazy Captain Cannon - Mission Billionaire Buster is more than a game, more than music, more than 3D animation, and more than comedy

  • Visit our main CCC website to discover more about the mystery of CCC

  • HINT: It involves our "Billion Dollar Monkey Showroom", and the world's biggest billionaire super villain of all time. Can you figure it out?

name: Crazy Captain Cannon - Mission: Billionaire Buster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Integrated sound card (DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Integrated sound card (DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card)

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: It's time to go full-pirate while having fun shooting cannons. CCC-MBB features realistic cannon-based-naval-warfare against enemy ships and fortresses, plus a great cast of characters, comedy, music, and more
